dcterms:description: A meticulously collected real-life trial dataset, comprising videos, audio files, and text transcripts gathered from various courtroom trials, ensuring a realistic and challenging environment for deception detection.
dcterms:title: Real-life trial dataset

dcterms:creator: Vishal Gupta

Manik Arora

Mayank Vatsa
dcterms:description: A multimodal dataset designed for deception detection, integrating various modalities to enhance detection accuracy.
dcterms:title: Bag-of-lies: A multimodal dataset for deception detection

dcterms:creator: Veronica Perez-Rosas
Mohamed Abouelenien
Rada Mihalcea
Mihai Burzo
dcterms:description: A study utilizing real-life trial data to detect deception, focusing on linguistic cues in spoken language.
dcterms:title: Deception detection using real-life trial data

dcterms:creator: Veronica Perez-Rosas
Mohamed Abouelenien
Rada Mihalcea
Mihai Burzo
dcterms:description: A dataset related to deception detection using sequential deep learning approaches, building on previous work with real-life trial data.
dcterms:title: Multi-modal deception detection using sequential deep learning approaches

dcterms:creator: M. Umut Şen
Verónica Pérez-Rosas
Berrin Yanikoglu
Mohamed Abouelenien
Mihai Burzo
Rada Mihalcea
dcterms:description: A dataset focusing on multimodal deception detection using real-life trial data, emphasizing the integration of verbal, acoustic, and visual cues.
dcterms:title: Multimodal deception detection using real-life trial data
